posts.postText:
So today, I was messing around with pistons.
And I got nowhere, EXCEPT I made one cool thing, which is this.
Basically, I made these pistons do the wave.
 http://k.min.us/ibGh0W.png 
 http://k.min.us/ibBejY.png 
 http://k.min.us/ibF2W4.png 
 http://k.min.us/ibF5eC.png 

I felt pretty smart when I finished, until I realized, there is no purpose to it, and that I will never be able to make it look any cooler.
Now connect those to note blocks.

>> Now connect those to note blocks. 

Heres the problem with that.
 http://k.min.us/ibF7pm.png 

And Idk how to fix that ;-;

I saw a video of the wave thing, but way bigger and with sand blocks

Like, 100x100 of the piston blocks.

>> I saw a video of the wave thing, but way bigger and with sand blocks

Like, 100x100 of the piston blocks. 
Yea I saw that too, but that was back when it was still a mod, and could launch things.

And btw, I figured it out, not that great, but I feel a little smarter:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ebq6MdQNTV0

Funnyraff, you have to space the noteblocks out. So instead of:


OOOOOOOOO
OOOOOOOOO
OOOOOOOOO
OOOOOOOOO
..................
XXXXXXXXXX


O = Redstone repeater shit thing i forgot
.=Redstone
X=Noteblocks
-=Nothing

it has to be this:

O-O-O-O-O-O-O-O
O-O-O-O-O-O-O-O
O-O-O-O-O-O-O-O
O-O-O-O-O-O-O-O
O-O-O-O-O-O-O-O
O-O-O-O-O-O-O-O
O-O-O-O-O-O-O-O
O-O-O-O-O-O-O-O
.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.-.
X-X-X-X-X-X-X-X-X
